header.title: Comparing Zilliz and Milvus
header.desc: Unleash a cloud-native experience with a complete feature set only available with Zilliz.

desc: Zilliz provides a cloud-native experience with a complete feature set that includes the above capabilities and more. With Zilliz, you can easily manage and scale your Milvus clusters, store and search vectors for similarity, and cost-effectively retain data at any scale without growing compute.

titles.easeOfUse: Built on Milvus and optimized for ease of use
